org.apache.openmeetings.core.session

Class SessionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.openmeetings.core.session.SessionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.openmeetings.db.dao.server.ISessionManager

    public class SessionManager
extends Object
implements org.apache.openmeetings.db.dao.server.ISessionManager
    Handle Client objects. Use a kind of decorator pattern to inject the Server into every call.
    Author:
    sebawagner
